DialogueText.Text: Hello! Would you be able to point me to whoever's in charge around here? I'm in need of their assistance at once!
My robes? I just easilly get cold is all; would rather stay bundled up, haha. Anyways, I really need to speak with the person in charge of this little town. You know where I might find them?
Oh?! Perfect! Nice to meet you! I've heard so much about you, and your heroics. I was wondering if you'd be willing to help me with a matter of grave importance.

I'm sure you've encountered them by now: The Selenic Order. Someone like you would certainly get their attention. They're planning something big, something that might threaten the entire world, and I need your help to stop them!
I've been keeping an eye on them for a while now, and as of late their movement has become bolder and bolder. I worry if they aren't stopped soon, they might just being about something catastrophic!

For now, I just need you to investigate the Dungeon. Some of my... cohorts took up residence there for a while, and the retrieval of some of our possessions would go a long way in stopping the Selenic Order. Though, do keep in mind that we abandoned it because of a particularly nasty haunting.
Wonderful! Let me know when you want to take on your first mission, and I'll let you know what I need.
